routes.title: Croissant Loop
routes.description: Wednesday morning classic, all welcome, non-drop ride.

routes.title: Kayonza Roundabout
routes.description: Dreadful traffic and lorries. A route towards Akagera National Park.

routes.title: Nyirangarama
routes.description: Nice road with climbing in the first half of way out.

routes.title: Nyirangarama Loop
routes.description: Long day in the saddle. Few climbs, especially in the beginning.

routes.title: Rukomo Roundabout
routes.description: Nice calm roads up north. Second half of way out is a long climb.
